text: "Papaoutai" is a song by Stromae, a singer from Belgium. It was released digitally in Belgium on May 13, 2013. It peaked at number 2 in Belgium and at number 15 in France. ==Music Video== The video was released on June 6 on Youtube, with a length of three minutes and fifty three seconds. ==Charts== === Weekly Charts === Chart (2013/2014) Peak position Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 3 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 1 France (SNEP)http://www.lescharts.com/showitem.asp?interpret=Stromae&titel;=Papaoutai&cat;=s 1 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 4 Israel (Media Forest) 8 Netherlands (Mega Single Top 100) 2 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 2 Euro Digital Songs (Billboard) 18 Luxembourg Digital Songs (Billboard) 2 ==References== Category:2013 songs
title: Papaoutai
